name: Lilas Nightmare
description:
Game

Lilas Nightmare is a 2D visual storytelling game in which a little girl has to find her way back home created for Global Game Jam 2021 Online.

Upon being lost in a dark forest, she finds an injured animal and makes it her mission to save the creature.
But all is not what it seems. Will Lila find her way home?

Creators

Thalia Darkow (@TDarkow), Kevin Andersch (@Yiasmat) and Jan Lygnos (@likeaguest)
